Constructor Detail

IconPort

public IconPort()

IconPort

public IconPort(java.lang.String n,
                java.lang.String t,
                java.lang.String params,
                char p_dir,
                char p_signalType,
                int xx1,
                int yy1,
                java.awt.Color cc)
Constructor of this class, with initial values of Name, Type, parameters, x-coordinates and y-coordinates for the two end-points of this arrow-shaped icon inports, and color being set to n, t, p, xx0, yy0, and cc. Note: xx1 and yy1 now represent the point with the arrow

Parameters:
n - the name of this icon inport
t - the type of this icon inport, either Java native data type, Nsl data type, or NslEnv type
params - the parameters of the corresponding variable representation of this icon inport
p_dir - direction of the icon port
p_signalType - excitatory or inhibitory. E or I
Since:
JDK1.1
